fields.name: CurrentValue
fields.description: The current value of the quota. If null or missing, the current value cannot be determined in the context of the request.

fields.name: Id
fields.description: The resource ID of the quota object

fields.name: Limit
fields.description: The maximum value of the quota. If null or missing, the quota has no maximum, in which case it merely tracks usage.

fields.name: Unit
fields.description: The unit for the quota, such as Count, Bytes, BytesPerSecond, etc.
